markdownRemark.excerpt: How to use traits in Factory Bot Factory Example Used:
markdownRemark.html:
How to use traits in Factory Bot

Factory

FactoryBot.define do
  factory :example do
    slug 'original'

    trait :other do
      slug 'other'
    end
  end
end

Example Used:

create(:example, :other)

frontmatter.title: Factory bot traits
frontmatter.description: How to use traits in Factory Bot

frontmatter.title: Factory bot pass other params to create other objects
